        Adds a friend to the list of this user's current friends.
        Specified by:
        addFollowedUser in interface SocialNetworkUser<U extends User>
        Parameters:
        circle - the group (circle) on which the user in going to be added
        user - the user to be added as a user followed
        Returns:
        true if the user to be added as a followed person does not exist yet, false otherwise

      • getFollowedUsersInGroup

        public java.util.Collection<U> getFollowedUsersInGroup​(java.lang.String groupName)
        If no group with groupName exists yet, this implementation must return an empty Collection. Gets the list of followed people belonging to a given group.
        Specified by:
        getFollowedUsersInGroup in interface SocialNetworkUser<U extends User>
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group
        Returns:
        the collection of people followed by this user within group "groupName".

      • getFollowedUsers

        public java.util.List<U> getFollowedUsers()
        Gets the list of every person followed by this user disregarding the group.
        Specified by:
        getFollowedUsers in interface SocialNetworkUser<U extends User>
        Returns:
        the list of people followed by this user among all her groups
